# List of workshop participants {#app:participants}

```{r participants}

in.df <- readxl::read_xlsx("../planning/workshop-participants.xlsx", sheet = "attendance", skip=1)

in.df <- rbind(in.df,
               c("Lisa Ailloud","Ailloud","NOAA NMFS", "Virtual","","","$\\checkmark$"),
               c("Julie Davies","Davies","DTU Aqua", "Virtual","$\\checkmark$","$\\checkmark$","$\\checkmark$")
               )

oo <- order(in.df$Lastname)
out.df <- in.df[oo,c(1,3:7)]

csasdown::csas_table(out.df, 
                     format="latex",
                     col_names = c("Name", "Affiliation", "Attendance", "Day 1 2023-01-31", "Day 2 2023-02-01", "Day 3 2023-02-02")) |>
  kableExtra::column_spec(c(1), width="3cm") |>
  kableExtra::column_spec(c(2), width="3cm") |>
  kableExtra::column_spec(c(3:6), width="2.0cm")
```
